entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 05:56 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
